channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These whales are almost finished loading up on U.S. stocks, so it’s time to start reducing risk, says former trader.
item.description: Former institutional trader Kevin Muir flags caution on chasing this market as he sees some big market whales nearing the end of a U.S. stock buying s...

item.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50,000. What now?
item.description: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA.”

item.title: ‘We are acquaintances, not friends’: My neighbors need somewhere to stay after a house fire. Do I say yes?
item.description: “We feel obliged to offer our house to this couple to live in while they deal with this horrible experience.”

item.title: Starbucks downgraded to underperform as broker sees too much froth in the stock price
item.description: Jefferies cools on Starbucks, expects the stock to grind lower

item.title: Coinbase steps into consumer market with stablecoin-powered 'everything app' that goes beyond trading
item.description: Coinbase is looking to reach a new subset of consumers who aren't necessarily interested in buying or trading crypto, the company's core business.

item.title: Despite Trump's tariffs, U.S. stocks with high international sales are beating domestic-focused names
item.description: A recent Goldman Sachs analysis found that the S&P 500 stocks with the greatest overseas sales exposure outperformed those with the least.
